name: Brouillette Aviation Training (B.A.T.)
about: Brouillette Aviation Training (B.A.T.) is a dedicated flight school located at Nashua Airport in New Hampshire. With nearly two decades of experience, B.A.T. offers professional, personalized flight instruction. Led by Steve Brouillette, an instructor with 37 years of flight training experience, the school provides training for Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor certifications. B.A.T. utilizes aircraft such as the Cessna 152 Aerobat and Cessna 172 Skyhawk, and offers introductory flights starting at $119. The school emphasizes top-quality instruction and hands-on flying experience. For those interested in pursuing a career in aviation or simply learning to fly, B.A.T. is a reliable and experienced choice. Contact Steve Brouillette today to begin your aviation journey.
services:
["Ground School
Intro Flight
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
Private Pilot
Instrument"]
